Services FAQ

Do you provide safety checks for landlords?
Yes, we can carry out annual landlord gas safety inspections of various appliances at your property, with certificates provided.
Do you inspect a property I am buying?
Yes, we can provide a report and test the safety and condition of any gas or central heating appliancies in the property.
Do you charge for quotations?
We can provide you with a free quote on routine work. If this is a more complex job it may require a survey and would have a charge, but we would let you know of this beforehand.
Questions?
Contact us for any further questions from our contact page.
